question: Which of the following rulers is considered to be the last ruler of Barid Shahi's of Bidar?
explanation: In 1609, Mirza Ali Barid Shah III was succeeded by the last ruler, Amir Barid III who fought against the Mughals in 1616 under the leadership of Malik Ambar. In 1619, Bidar was annexed to the Bijapur sultanate.
